title: Burned paper that had a Hadith but unsure if it fully burned, check trash again? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: YF from tunia I found a paper with of the Prophet alai wasallam and some other text uh I burned it until it turned black and broke into pieces but like not to ashes when I threw it away I saw a word that is not part of the Hadith that was still visible but I still assumed that the Hadith was probably uh discarded of now I'm doubting if I should take it out of the trash to ensure that is in readable what should they do no no need to do that no need to do that this is Shan messing up with your head just move on with life
